section.p: Contains information about the resources or referrals that were made for this case.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] category with data type Code
Contains the unique id for the resource and or referral for the case.

Contains exactly one [1..1] nbrOfReferrals with data type Integer
Contains the number of referrals.
Contains exactly one [1..1] wereAbleToAccess with data type Boolean

Contains the number of referrals.
